title: Donor
comment: This object type is abstract. These properties are inherited by other object types

treatments.description: A list of treatments applied to the donor.
treatments.comment: Can include drug treatments, medication, and/or conditions like fasting

diseases.description: Known diseases carried by the donor.

life_stage.title: Life stage
life_stage.description: Life stage of donor at collection of tissue biosample.

genotype.title: Genotype
genotype.description: For human, known genetic variants. For mouse, the genetic alleles for the genetic modifications.

weight_unit.title: Weight unit
weight_unit.description: Unit of weight measurement of donor.

items.title: Database external identifier
items.description: Identifier an from external resource that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.
